09431DDE.Line13.8CA44: To think I would find him here of all places! Still just as intense, and still traveling with interesting company! (laughs)

28212CD1.Line7.8CA44: Hah! Hasn’t told you much about himself, eh? I remember when you couldn’t stop him from talking!

311F0C80.VoiceDir9.8CA44: Pronunciation: Ar-ah-nock. Loot Go-lain. Direction: wistful, you're in full storyteller mode here.

597949AB.VoiceDir13.8CA44: wistful, you're in full storyteller mode here. Happy memories

6F4EA45C.Line11.8CA44: Deckard always was such an intense fellow, but kind and dependable. Took it upon himself to right any wrong he found, and we found many!

972A92FE.VoiceDir7.8CA44: Jovial. Someone has asked you to tell you about your best friend.

BF84D029.VoiceDir11.8CA44: wistful, you're in full storyteller mode here. Happy memories

C215A653.Line9.8CA44: We met several lifetimes ago! In Aranoch, I believe, or maybe Lut Gholein? That’s right, I was a sailor back then, and a handsome one too!
